text: Celesdonio Abeso Oyono Mate (born 15 August 1998), known as Celesdonio, is an Equatoguinean footballer who plays as a forward for Liga Nacional de Fútbol club Cano Sport Academy and the Equatorial Guinea national team. ==International career== Celesdonio made his international debut for Equatorial Guinea in 2018. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Equatorial Guinea's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:100%;" ! No. !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! title: Celesdonio Abeso
